title: x/tools/go/ssa/interp: TestGorootTest times out when GOARCH=386
body: GOARCH=386 go test ./go/ssa/interp/ -v -run TestGorootTest takes a very long time -- probably it's going to hit 10 minutes and time out but I haven't waited that long yet. It's slow but not so stupidly slow when GOARCH=amd64 -- about 52s.
